response_time.question: How quickly will you respond to my inquiry?
response_time.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, we aim to respond within 2-4 hours.

languages.question: What languages do you support?
languages.answer: Our team speaks English, Russian, Chinese, and French. We can accommodate other languages through our translation services.

minimum_order.question: Is there a minimum order requirement?
minimum_order.answer: We work with orders of all sizes, from single stones to large wholesale quantities. Contact us to discuss your specific needs.
